effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a small chance to hit a Jackpot! granting you Clearcasting and 5% increased spell damage for 12 sec. Casting Touch of the Magi always hits a Jackpot!
(4) Set: When you hit a Jackpot!, you also gain Aether Attunement at 100% effectiveness.

spells.description: Use: Receive cryptic instructions from somewhere in the Twisting Nether to reveal your next task. It's probably nothing, so complete it to gain 12,053 Intellect for 15 sec.  (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
